name: Controlled useState
description: Todo list with priority filtering using controlled components with useState hook
approach: Uses React's useState hook to manage task form inputs, tasks array, and filter states. Implements filtering logic across multiple priority categories and console logging of task data.
features: Text input for task description with validation
Radio button group for priority selection
Console logging of task data in required format
Bootstrap card layout with responsive design
Visual priority badges with color coding
Task list with numbering and priority display
Statistics showing task counts by priority
Empty state handling for no tasks/filtered results
